alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 10:20AM CDT until June 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, Greene and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, Beaumont...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening to 18.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning to 17.9 feet Tuesday evening. It will rise above flood stage again late Tuesday evening to 18.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
